CREATE OBJECT zaplink_gui=>o_options.
AT SELECTION-SCREEN.
AT SELECTION-SCREEN OUTPUT. * Options : DEVC & TR DATA _active TYPE i. IF a_import IS INITIAL. _active = 0. ELSE. _active = 1. ENDIF. LOOP AT SCREEN. CASE screen-name. WHEN '%FDVF007_0110' OR '%_17NNJ0000543372_%_%_%_%_%_%_' " scr 110 OR '%FTRF003_0120' OR '%_17NNJ0000543372_%_%_%_%_%_%_' " scr 120 OR 'TABSTRIP_T_BLOCK' OR '%PDEV020_1000' OR '%PTRO021_1000' OR '%_SUBSCREEN_T_BLOCK' OR '%_17SNS0000543372_%_%_%_%_%_%_'. " Scr 1000 screen-active = _active. MODIFY SCREEN. ENDCASE. ENDLOOP. LOOP AT SCREEN. IF a_create = 'X'. IF screen-group1 = 'NNM'. screen-active = '1'. screen-invisible = '0'. MODIFY SCREEN. ELSEIF screen-group1 = 'NPG' OR screen-group1 = 'NFL' OR screen-group1 = 'NOW' OR screen-group1 = 'NPC' OR screen-group1 = 'RNM'. screen-active = '0'. screen-invisible = '1'. MODIFY SCREEN. ENDIF. ELSEIF a_import = 'X'. IF screen-group1 = 'NFL' OR screen-group1 = 'NOW'. screen-active = '1'. screen-invisible = '0'. MODIFY SCREEN. ELSEIF screen-group1 = 'NNM' OR screen-group1 ='NPG' OR screen-group1 = 'NPC' OR screen-group1 = 'RNM'. screen-active = '0'. screen-invisible = '1'. MODIFY SCREEN. ENDIF. ELSEIF a_add = 'X'. IF screen-group1 = 'NFL' OR screen-group1 = 'NPG'. screen-active = '1'. screen-invisible = '0'. MODIFY SCREEN. ELSEIF screen-group1 = 'NNM' OR screen-group1 = 'NOW' OR screen-group1 = 'NPC' OR screen-group1 = 'RNM'. screen-active = '0'. screen-invisible = '1'. MODIFY SCREEN. ENDIF. ELSEIF a_add_p = 'X'. IF screen-group1 = 'NFL' OR screen-group1 = 'NPC'. screen-active = '1'. screen-invisible = '0'. MODIFY SCREEN. ELSEIF screen-group1 = 'NNM' OR screen-group1 = 'NOW' OR screen-group1 = 'NPG' OR screen-group1 = 'RNM'. screen-active = '0'. screen-invisible = '1'. MODIFY SCREEN. ENDIF. ELSEIF a_dsp = 'X' OR a_uninst = 'X'. IF screen-group1 = 'NFL'. screen-active = '1'. screen-invisible = '0'. MODIFY SCREEN. ELSEIF screen-group1 = 'NNM' OR screen-group1 ='NPG' OR screen-group1 = 'NOW' OR screen-group1 = 'NPC' OR screen-group1 = 'RNM'. screen-active = '0'. screen-invisible = '1'. MODIFY SCREEN. ENDIF. ELSEIF a_add_tr = 'X'. IF screen-group1 = 'NFL' OR screen-group1 = 'RNM'. screen-active = '1'. screen-invisible = '0'. MODIFY SCREEN. ELSEIF screen-group1 = 'NNM' OR screen-group1 = 'NOW' OR screen-group1 = 'NPG' OR screen-group1 = 'NPC'. screen-active = '0'. screen-invisible = '1'. MODIFY SCREEN. ENDIF. ENDIF. ENDLOOP.
*** value request for input fields AT SELECTION-SCREEN ON VALUE-REQUEST FOR co_type. zaplink_connectors=>get_values( CHANGING type = co_type ).
AT SELECTION-SCREEN ON VALUE-REQUEST FOR p_file. DATA l_file TYPE zaplink_gui=>td_filename.
l_file = p_file. CALL METHOD zaplink_gui=>containerfile_select CHANGING filename = l_file. p_file = l_file.
AT SELECTION-SCREEN ON VALUE-REQUEST FOR p_tr-low. iv_organizer_type = 'W'. * is_selection-reqstatus = 'R'. CALL FUNCTION 'TR_PRESENT_REQUESTS_SEL_POPUP' EXPORTING iv_organizer_type = iv_organizer_type is_selection = is_selection IMPORTING es_selected_request = es_selected_request es_selected_task = es_selected_task.
p_tr-low = es_selected_request-trkorr.
